reviewText: it was great! this was the only dvd we were missing form the set .
The disk looked ok, but it would not play in the DVD player,  I then put it in the computer and it took maybe 5 tries to get it to work. Not what I expected.

This story andall the others that Mormons tell make Battlefield Earth look like the Science Channel. Indians hanging with Jesus, gold tablets that no one can see. Drop some LSD and it would be fun. Hey, the LDS needs LSD. Cool.

I love this Video due to the fact that everytime I view it brings tears to my eyes.  It reminds me of the forgiveness that the Lord really has for each and everyone of us no matter how serious the sins the Lord really will for give us for them.  Excellent message for young and old.  Thanks Marshal.
This story will probably touch many people who have been a "black sheep" in the family and see the error of their ways. Very powerful images of acceptance and mercy.
